com.ace.lewissketch
Class LsUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.ace.lewissketch.LsUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
LsConstants
public class LsUtils
extends Object
implements LsConstants

A collection of utility functions and constants for the LewisSketch applet.

Parameters:

totalLength - the length of the string
